title: The Great Smoky Mountains
description: The Great Smoky Mountains are named for the blue haze that often hangs over the mountains due to volatile chemicals released by pine forests. But in November 2016, the Smokies lived up to their name for a very different reason.
theme:
SIMPLE. The beauty in the minimalist
expressions of our planet
